themes: clarity and transparency of scoring rubrics
simplification of application and reporting processes
expansion of eligible funding uses (interior historic improvements)
key_phrases: A clearer picture of the scoring rubric for the Heritage Preservation grants would be helpful
Simplified reporting and application process for both awards
Elevate funding have some criteria that is tied to the artistic impact of the project on the region
Heritage Preservation guidelines could be simplified and more widely promoted
funding available for interior historic capital improvements through the Heritage Preservation grants
barriers_identified: lack of clarity in scoring rubric
ineligibility of interior historic improvements for funding
solutions_proposed: provide a clearer picture of the scoring rubric for Heritage Preservation grants
simplify reporting and application process for both awards
tie Elevate funding criteria to artistic impact on the region
simplify and more widely promote Heritage Preservation guidelines
make funding available for interior historic capital improvements
